tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE retention_policy (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  personal_info TEXT,
  expiration_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE personal_information (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    info_type VARCHAR(50),
    info_content TEXT,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP,
    expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE personal_information (
    info_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_value TEXT,
    expiration_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id)
);

CREATE TABLE expiration_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    info_id INT,
    action_taken VARCHAR(50),
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (info_id) REFERENCES personal_information(info_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_retention_policies (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  retention_period INTERVAL NOT NULL,
  expire_date TIMESTAMP,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dob DATE,
  address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE user_data (
  data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  data JSONB NOT NULL,
  created_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  expire_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE log_activity (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  activity_description VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  activity_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  expire_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE expired_data (
  expired_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  data_id UUID,
  expire_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  deletion_date TIMESTAMP
)
